=== Submitting test results ===

To submit test results, you need to <nowiki>[[http://mozilla.qa.ubuntu.com/user/register|register]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://mozilla.qa.ubuntu.com/user|login]]</nowiki> on <nowiki>[[http://mozilla.qa.ubuntu.com|the QA tracker]]</nowiki>. When you log in:
* Select the package you were testing in the list.
* Click on the title of the test you were doing.
* Choose whether the test passed or failed, and enter your comments in the provided Comment field.

Thank you for helping out with Mozilla team QA.
